mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDMAIN (BOARDID, CATEGORYID, USERID, COMMENTID, FILEID, TITLE, CONTENT, UP, DOWN) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{categoryId}, #{userId},#{commentId},#{fileId},#{title},#{content},#{up},#{down})
INSERT INTO BOARDMAIN (BOARDID, CATEGORYID, TITLE, CONTENT, USERID) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{categoryId}, #{title},#{content}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDMAIN SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE BOARDID = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT U.USERID, U.NICKNAME, M.TITLE, M.CONTENT, M.UP, M.DOWN, M.CATEGORYID, M.BOARDID, M.TIME, M.HIT FROM BOARDUSER U, BOARDMAIN M WHERE U.USERID = M.USERID AND M.BOARDID = #{param1} ORDER BY TIME ASC
SELECT * FROM BOARDMAIN WHERE CATEGORYID = #{param1} ORDER BY TIME ASC
SELECT * FROM BOARDUSER U, BOARDMAIN M WHERE U.USERID = M.USERID AND M.CATEGORYID = #{param1} ORDER BY TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT PAGE.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, U.NICKNAME, M.TITLE, M.CONTENT, M.UP, M.DOWN, M.CATEGORYID, M.BOARDID, M.TIME, M.HIT FROM BOARDUSER U, BOARDMAIN M WHERE U.USERID = M.USERID AND M.CATEGORYID = #{categoryId} ORDER BY TIME DESC) PAGE
WHERE ROWNUM <=#{pageSize}*(#{pageNo})) WHERE RNUM > #{pageSize}*(#{pageNo}-1)
